member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS
member.summary: The PROV_ENUMALGS structure is used with the function when the PP_ENUMALGS parameter is retrieved to contain information about an algorithm supported by a cryptographic service provider (CSP).

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS.aiAlgid
member.summary: One of the ALG_ID values that identifies the algorithm.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS.dwBitLen
member.summary: The default key length, in bits, of the algorithm.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS.dwNameLen
member.summary: The length, in CHARs, of the szName string. This length includes the terminating null character.

member.name: PROV_ENUMALGS.szName
member.summary: A null-terminated ANSI string that contains the name of the algorithm.
